title: Verify language switcher changes site locale correctly
description: Test that selecting a language from the language switcher updates the site's locale, loads content in the selected language, and updates routes accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage with default locale
Verify homepage content is in default language
Use language switcher to select alternate supported language
URL updates with locale prefix and content updates to selected language
Navigate to services page in new locale
Verify services listing content is localized and loads correctly

title: Verify dynamic sitemap.xml generation
description: Ensure sitemap.xml is generated dynamically and reflects current site structure with all localized pages and services.

steps.description: Request /sitemap.xml from the site
Verify sitemap XML is valid
Verify URLs include all supported locales for homepage and key pages
Verify service detail pages appear with their respective slugs and locales

title: Verify robots.txt dynamic generation
description: Check that robots.txt is dynamically generated and contains correct directives reflecting current SEO configuration.

steps.description: Request /robots.txt from the site
Verify robots.txt contains valid User-agent and Allow/Disallow entries
Verify sitemap URL is correctly referenced in robots.txt

title: Contact form submission success and rate limiting
description: Test the contact form submission triggers email API call and enforces rate limiting to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Navigate to contact form
Fill in valid contact form data
Submit contact form
Verify email is sent via Resend email API
Submit contact form repeatedly exceeding rate limit threshold
Verify server rejects requests after rate limit exceeded with appropriate error

title: Handle contact form API errors gracefully
description: Verify that network failures or email API errors during contact form submission show user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Simulate network failure on contact form submission
Submit contact form with valid data
Verify that friendly error message is displayed and form is not submitted
Simulate Resend API failure response
Submit contact form
Verify user sees failure notification and form retains inputs

title: Verify homepage main sections render correctly with localized content
description: Ensure hero, services preview, testimonials, partners, and contact CTA sections are visible and localized on the homepage for each supported language.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage in each supported locale
Verify hero section text and images appear correctly and localized
Verify preview of services listing is accurate and localized
Verify testimonials section displays correct client quotes in locale
Verify partner logos are displayed
Verify contact call-to-action button is visible and localized

title: Verify service listing page with slug navigation
description: Check that the service listing page loads localized service summaries and that individual service pages load correctly by slug with correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to service listing page in a supported locale
Verify all services are listed with localized names and summaries
Click on individual service link by slug
Verify detailed service page loads with correct localized content
Navigate to non-existing service slug URL
Verify 404 or appropriate error page is displayed

title: Verify legal pages accessibility and correct localization
description: Ensure privacy policy and terms and conditions pages are accessible, properly localized, and display correct legal text for each supported language.

steps.description: Navigate to privacy policy page in each supported locale
Verify page loads successfully and text is localized
Navigate to terms and conditions page in each supported locale
Verify page loads successfully and text is localized

title: Ensure main UI components render correctly and respond across devices
description: Validate header, footer, language switcher, brand logo, WhatsApp button, and analytics container render correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

steps.description: Load any main page on desktop viewport
Verify header, footer, language switcher, logo, and WhatsApp button are visible and functional
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions and reload
Verify UI components adapt responsively and remain visible and interactive
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions and reload
Verify UI components remain usable, accessible, and correctly styled

title: Validate global Tailwind CSS styles consistency
description: Check that global styling via Tailwind CSS is consistently applied across all pages and components with no visual regressions.

steps.description: Navigate through homepage, service listing, service detail, legal pages, and contact form
Verify consistent color schemes, spacing, typography, and responsive layouts as per Tailwind configuration
Compare visual styling with baseline design spec
Confirm no style regressions or inconsistencies are present

title: Verify language middleware routing behavior
description: Test the middleware that handles locale routing to ensure requests to localized paths serve correct content and fallback behavior is correct.

steps.description: Navigate to an URL with an existing locale prefix
Page loads with locale specific content
Navigate to an URL without locale prefix
Middleware redirects or serves page with default locale content
Navigate to URL with unsupported locale prefix
Middleware handles gracefully, either redirecting to default locale or showing error

title: Test language-specific loading UI during route changes
description: Verify that the loading UI localized per current language appears during locale-based route changes.

steps.description: Trigger language switcher selection or navigate to a locale route causing page load
Verify that loading indicator displays and is localized in the target locale
Verify loading UI disappears once content fully loads

title: Validate integration of contact form with Resend email API
description: Ensure that the backend API route correctly integrates with Resend email API and uses configured environment variables securely.

steps.description: Submit contact form with test input
Verify API forwards email request to Resend with proper parameters
Verify .env.local is loaded securely and no sensitive info is exposed in frontend
Attempt to bypass rate limit with API calls
Verify rate limiting enforcement applies on API layer
